text:
Impraise (YC S14) - Amsterdam, The Netherlands - ONSITE - Frontend, Backend - http://impraise.com

Impraise is a web & mobile app for real-time feedback, recognition and coaching at work. We are fundamentally changing the way people share feedback and learn at work. We make it very easy for employees to give and receive feedback from colleagues. We also help managers to understand how to improve the performance of their teams. Ultimately, we help people develop their professional skills and become better at their job.

Our stack: Ruby / Rails, React, GraphQL, AWS, Docker, etc...

More details on the job offers: http://jobs.impraise.com/
